title: Can someone give me installer new client?
body:
Hello,

I was got in 3 months new client , but today i got a bugged which i required to reinstall league.But new client has been dissapeared and i didn't find any downloads for new client because is closed beta.Can someone give me a link please?

replies.body:
The Beta Client is not in a closed beta. You should have an option to upgrade in your Legacy Patcher, as shown below:

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

Let me know if you have any questions!
